languages.text: "Вот и думается мне... может быть, вы можете вмешаться в эту несправедливость? Вмешаться в вопрос наследования... или еще как..."
"So I'm thinking... maybe you can step in and set things right? Intervene in the matter of the inheritance... or I don't know..."
languages.original_text: "Вот и думается мне... может быть, вы можете вмешаться в эту несправедливость? Вмешаться в вопрос наследования... или еще как..."

traits.locale_text: "So I'm thinking... maybe you can step in and set things right? Intervene in the matter of inheritance... or I don't know..."
"So I'm thinking... maybe you can step in and set things right? Intervene in the matter of inheritance... or I don't know..."
"So I'm thinking... maybe you can step in and set things right? Intervene in the matter of the inheritance... or I don't know..."
"So I'm thinking... maybe you can step in and set things right? Intervene in the matter of the inheritance... or I don't know..."
"So I'm thinking... maybe you can step in and set things right? Intervene in the matter of the inheritance... or I don't know..."

languages.text: “所以我在想……或许你可以让一切恢复正常？你可以插手遗产的问题……或者说，我也说不好……”
languages.original_text: "So I'm thinking... maybe you can step in and set things right? Intervene in the matter of the inheritance... or I don't know..."

traits.locale_text: “所以我在想……或许你可以让一切恢复正常？你可以插手遗产的问题……或者说，我也说不好……”

languages.text: «Así que estaba pensando... ¿no podría intervenir y arreglar esto? Cambiar algo en el tema de la herencia... o yo qué sé...».
languages.original_text: "So I'm thinking... maybe you can step in and set things right? Intervene in the matter of the inheritance... or I don't know..."

traits.locale_text: «Así que estaba pensando... ¿no podría intervenir y arreglar esto? Cambiar algo en el tema de la herencia... o yo qué sé...».

languages.text: 「そこで、だ…あんたの力でなんとかしてもらえんかな？相続の問題に介入するとか…なんかさ…」
languages.original_text: "So I'm thinking... maybe you can step in and set things right? Intervene in the matter of the inheritance... or I don't know..."

traits.locale_text: 「そこで、だ…あんたの力でなんとかしてもらえんかな？相続の問題に介入するとか…なんかさ…」

languages.text: "Und jetzt denke ich mir ... könntet Ihr vielleicht eingreifen und die Sache in Ordnung bringen? Ihr könntet in der Angelegenheit der Hinterlassenschaft intervenieren ... oder so ..."
languages.original_text: "So I'm thinking... maybe you can step in and set things right? Intervene in the matter of the inheritance... or I don't know..."

traits.locale_text: "Und jetzt denke ich mir ... könntet Ihr vielleicht eingreifen und die Sache in Ordnung bringen? Ihr könntet in der Angelegenheit der Hinterlassenschaft intervenieren ... oder so ..."

languages.text: « Je me disais donc... que vous pourriez peut-être intervenir ? Au sujet de l'héritage ou... je ne sais pas... »
languages.original_text: "So I'm thinking... maybe you can step in and set things right? Intervene in the matter of the inheritance... or I don't know..."

traits.locale_text: « Je me disais donc... que vous pourriez peut-être intervenir ? Au sujet de l'héritage ou... je ne sais pas... »

languages.text: "Düşünüyordum da belki siz olaya dâhil olup işleri yoluna koyarsınız. Miras meselesine müdahale etseniz yani... Bilemedim."
languages.original_text: "So I'm thinking... maybe you can step in and set things right? Intervene in the matter of the inheritance... or I don't know..."

traits.locale_text: "Düşünüyordum da belki siz olaya dâhil olup işleri yoluna koyarsınız. Miras durumuna müdahale etseniz yani... Bilmiyorum."
